Package com.exacttarget.etpushsdk

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ETAnalytics
    Analytics for Journey Builder for Apps (JB4A) SDK.
    ETLandingPagePresenter
    This activity is the default activity that will be launched when your customer taps a notification that contains a CloudPage or OpenDirect URL.
    ETLocationManager
    ETLocationManager is responsible for finding an accurate location and retrieving a list of Geofence regions and their associated messages from your MobilePush account in the SFMC.
    ETNotifications
    A class that holds two interfaces to override the default notification processing.
    ETPush
    JB4A SDK main class for MobilePush actions.
    ETPushConfig
    The configuration used to bootstrap your app to the SDK using ETPush.configureSdk(ETPushConfig, ETPushConfigureSdkListener).
    ETPushConfig.Builder
    Build a new ETPushConfig instance to bootstrap your app with the SDK.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ETException
    Exception type for errors generated from JB4A SDK
